channel.title: Game Crashes On Fan Spin Up
channel.description: When you're turning on the power to be able to incinerate the "space octopus" and you activate the fan to spin, my game crashes, I've tried closing and re-opening etc. Would prefer if I didn't have to re-install the game, thanks :slight_smile: I fixed it by destroying a box in the fan, it could be any other loose debris aswell. To do so, enable the console (Esc.setting>keyboard>advanced settings (it's across the bottom of the small settings windows)>enable developer console. Then type in: "Sv_cheats 1 noclip" (no quotes) Now destroy/ move debris then no clip your way back to the lever then dis-able noclip by simply typing in "noclip" in the developer console again. And know it seems so obscured that debris in a fan can crash a game but it worked for me. Good Luck :slight_smile: hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T6_53_26C0.mdmp (95.4 KB)

item.title: Game Crashes On Fan Spin Up
item.dc:creator: Findulidas
item.description:
Bitmicro:

When you’re turning on the power to be able to incinerate the “space octopus” and you activate the fan to spin, my game crashes, I’ve tried closing and re-opening etc.
Would prefer if I didn’t have to re-install the game, thanks

I have the same issue. Until they post a fix or something I just noclipped to get past it.

just type this in the console:

sv_cheats 1 (then press enter)
noclip

To get out of noclip just type noclip again.
